response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 to us due to its unique features, superior materials, and the time and expertise that went into its creation. Considering its unmatched capabilities and benefits, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or operations. To make this opportunity accessible to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase the product for $14,500. Should you decide to proceed, please let me know, and we can arrange for immediate delivery and any necessary documentation.", "product_price": 14500}
